channel.title: MySQL Server/Client Help
channel.description: Basically I need help setting up mysql for my client and source on my vps. I also need a few pages fixed on my webpage it has a recoverpanel and activate links and all that nice stuff that when i try using it i get a mysql error, if you could help me set this up pm me or post and ill give you the tv info for my vps -thanks -cmrchris
